query.ejb-ql: select object(o) from AccountAdjustment as o where o.custID = ?1
select object(o) from AccountAdjustment as o where o.referRecordID = ?1
select object(o) from AccountItem as o where o.custID = ?1
select object(o) from AccountItem as o where o.psID = ?1
select object(o) from AccountItem as o where o.acctID = ?1
select object(o) from AccountItem as o where o.serviceAccountID = ?1
select object(o) from AccountItem as o where o.referType = ?1 and o.referID = ?2
select object(o) from AcctItemType as o where o.summaryTo = ?1
select object(o) from CACommand as o where o.commandName = ?1
select object(o) from CACondition as o where o.condName = ?1
select object(o) from CPCampaignMap as o where o.custProductID = ?1
select object(o) from CPCampaignMap as o where o.ccId = ?1
select object(o) from CPCampaignMap as o where o.ccId = ?1 and o.status= ?2
select OBJECT(o) from CsiCustProductInfo as o where o.csiID = ?1
select OBJECT(o) from CsiCustProductInfo as o where o.csiID = ?1 and o.groupNo = ?2 and o.sheafNo = ?3
select OBJECT(o) from CsiCustProductInfo as o where o.csiID = ?1 and o.productID = ?2
select object(o) from CpConfigedProperty as o where o.psID = ?1
select object(o) from PaymentRecord as o where o.custId = ?1
select object(o) from PaymentRecord as o where o.sourceType = ?1 and o.sourceRecordId = ?2
select object(o) from CustomerProduct as o where o.customerID = ?1
select object(o) from CustomerProduct as o where o.serviceAccountID = ?1
select object(o) from CustomerProduct as o where o.serviceAccountID = ?1 and o.status = ?2
select object(o) from CustomerProduct as o where o.accountID = ?1
select object(o) from CustomerProduct as o where o.customerID = ?1 and o.status <> ?2
select object(o) from GroupBargainDetail as o where o.detailNo = ?1
select object(o) from GroupBargainDetail as o where o.groupBargainID = ?1
select object(o) from GroupBargainDetail as o where o.userID = ?1
select object(o) from Invoice as o where o.barCode = ?1
select object(o) from Invoice as o where o.acctID= ?1
select object(o) from Operator as o where o.loginID=?1
select object(o) from Organization as o where o.parentOrgID = ?1
select object(o) from TerminalDevice as o where o.serialNo = ?1 and o.deviceClass = ?2
select object(o) from TerminalDevice as o where o.serialNo = ?1
select object(o) from BillingCycle as o where o.cType =?1
select object(o) from Account as o where o.customerID=?1
select object(o) from BillingRuleItem as o where o.brId=?1
select object(o) from CallBackInfo as o where o.referSourceType=?1 and o.referSourceId=?2
select object(o) from CampaignToMarketSegment as o where o.campaignId=?1
select object(o) from CustAcctCycleCfg as o where o.customerType = ?1 and o.accountType = ?2
select object(o) from CustMarketInfo as o where o.customerId = ?1
select object(o) from CustomerCampaign as o where o.serviceAccountID = ?1
select object(o) from CustomerCampaign as o where o.csiID = ?1 and o.campaignID=?2
select object(o) from CustomerCampaign as o where o.csiID = ?1
select object(o) from DeviceMatchToProduct as o where o.productId = ?1
select OBJECT(o) from DistrictSetting as o where o.belongTo = ?1
select object(o) from MarketSegmentToDistrict as o where o.marketSegmentId = ?1
select object(o) from NewCustomerMarketInfo as o where o.newCustomerId = ?1
select OBJECT(o) from PackageLine as o where o.packageId=?1
select OBJECT(o) from PackageToMarketSegment as o where o.packageId = ?1
select OBJECT(o) from ProductDependency as o where o.productId = ?1
select OBJECT(o) from ProductDependency as o where o.productId = ?1 and o.type = ?2
select OBJECT(o) from UserPointsExchangeCond as o where o.activityId = ?1
select OBJECT(o) from UserPointsExchangeGoods as o where o.activityId = ?1
select OBJECT(o) from UserPointsExchangeRule as o where o.exchangeGoodsTypeId = ?1 and o.activityId = ?2
select OBJECT(o) from UserPointsExchangeRule as o where o.activityId = ?1
select object(o) from FinanceSetOffMap as o where o.plusReferId = ?1
select object(o) from BatchJobItem as o where o.batchId = ?1
select object(o) from LdapCondition as o where o.condName = ?1
select object(o) from ServiceDependency as o where o.serviceId = ?1
select object(o) from ServiceDependency as o where o.referServiceId = ?1
select object(o) from QueryResultItem as o where o.queryId = ?1
select object(o) from BidimConfigSettingValue as o where o.settingId = ?1
select object(o) from LogisticsSetting as o
select OBJECT(o) from VoiceFriendPhoneNo as o where o.serviceAccountID = ?1 and o.phoneNo = ?2
select object(o) from Contract as o
select object(o) from ContractToPackage as o where o.contractNo = ?1
select object(o) from OssAuthorization as o where o.deviceID = ?1
select object(o) from OssAuthorization as o where o.deviceID = ?1 and o.productID=?2
select object(o) from CampaignAgmtPackage as o where o.campaignID = ?1
select object(o) from Bundle2Campaign as o where o.campaignID = ?1
select object(o) from CampaignAgmtProduct as o where o.campaignID = ?1
select object(o) from FaPiao as o where o.serailNo = ?1
select object(o) from Fapiao2Payment as o where o.fapiaoSeqNo = ?1
select object(o) from FapiaoVolumn as o where o.volumnSn = ?1
select object(o) from FapiaoVolumn as o where o.type = ?1 and o.volumnSn = ?2
